name: Victoria
title: Web Developer
description: Aspiring Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience from the TakeHerTech program at kLab Rwanda and the AmaliTech Women Coding Bootcamp. I’ve built real-world projects like a blog management system, PSD-to-React portfolio, and an event platform with authentication and file uploads. I’m passionate about turning ideas into functional, user-friendly apps using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Quick to learn, eager to grow, and ready to thrive in dynamic dev teams.
